channel.title: Is this what happens to home school kids?
channel.description:
http://www.ebaumsworld.com/video/watch/23559/ I was homeschooled for 2 months but decided on going back to school, i am so glad i went back to school. Are all home schooled kids like him? Oh also from the comments on this video (i couldnt have said it better myself):
Dden5 | Posted at 08:30am Jul, 12 2007 THIS is exactly what homeschooling CAN do to a kid... make him into a mindless learner that has no life... Im not saying that all homeschoolers are like this, but jesus, this is a classic case of the kid who's never going to get laid and turning into the 40 year old virgin. Here he is fucking telling a HOT CNN reporter that she said his name wrong, how he likes Subway tuna sandwiches and how him and his MOM aren't surprised that he won a spelling bee. If you ask me, this kid hasn't been taught any life skills whatsoever, and although he might end up making serious cash, he probably has no friends and no real fun. four words can summarize what I've just said... THIS KID IS SAD

[quote=“Bang Train, post:24, topic:122352”][quote author=MastrChief link=topic=172028.msg1591942#msg1591942 date=1184309162]

Its this country of 'NO SEX / PORN / ADULT/ BAD TO RELIGIONS/HACKING / PROXY WEBSITES ROFL!
Nothing to see even most of youtube Videos are blocked…ROFL!!

And what country do you live in?
[/quote]
The United States in 10 years. He posts through a wormhole from the future.[/quote]
Lawl@that response… Then cries cuz it’s tre.

@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:122372”][quote author=lothy link=topic=172028.msg1589910#msg1589910 date=1184264490]

I know what you are talking about and that thing is illegal in my country …But can someone please upload the video some where else? because the “country” i live in just strict about websites and it blockes almost every website says “Adult” in …So i dont say you must! only if you had time i will appreciate it =) thanks

Are you living in China or something? =\ Otherwise, I’d say it’s your parents doing.
[/quote]
nop if i was in china i would be makin fake stuff now not here (no offence)
and if i just typed the word “proxy” in google i will find all the page blocked and cant see nothing. :P[/quote]

IF i was in china, my brother and sister would be dead

@XxKanexX wrote:

Oh god…
The saddest part is he tried to redeem his “e-penis rep” by basing his incorrect spelling on the fact that he heard the word wrong.

He repeated it fine.
Get over it, you spelt a damn word wrong.

I felt sorry for that reporter.

item.title: Is this what happens to home school kids?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

lmao loved the quote from G-shack.com =D

I was just browing through ebaumsworld watching people getting killed or seriously injured and this caught my eye, it made me think real hard about home school kids and what psychological damage it does to them.

It is kind of like keeping a kid locked up in a house for 17 years or untill when ever they finish their edumacations.

item.title: Is this what happens to home school kids?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Seen the video before on another forum. They were talking about if the kid was autistic or not and how they would kick his ass if they met him.
Quote from one of the members:

I don't care if he has some sort of disorder.

He would piss Jesus off.

Jesus “Hello, My name is Jesus”

Obnoxious Child “Jesus? Or Jesus (Hey-Zoo-s)… I can’t spell it if you can’t say it right”

Jesus “… they’re spelled the same?”

Obnoxious Child “I eat tuna subs from Subway, so, I know what I’m talking about”

Jesus "leans over to God…this one goes in the ‘basement’ "

Read full topic

item.title: Is this what happens to home school kids?
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

My friend Shaun had public ecucation until 8th grade, then he got homeschooled. He’s a senior now. He’s ok, but the same can’t be said for his brother, who’s just as bad if not worse than that kid. The truth is, yes, they make do good in the financial world because of education, but at the first social problem they have, they will crumble.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 07:16:38 AM[/size][hr][quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:122364”]I know what you are talking about and that thing is illegal in my country …But can someone please upload the video some where else? because the “country” i live in just strict about websites and it blockes almost every website says “Adult” in …So i dont say you must! only if you had time i will appreciate it =) thanks[/quote]

I’m sorry. It must be bad. Look up how to use proxies on google. That could be of good service to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this what happens to home school kids?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

One of a parent’s goals is to make their child a social person. Not knowing how to socialise can lead to problems when working (not knowing how to deal with people appropriately).
